title: "No availabile source device" - sync is stuck

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Me and a friend are sharing a folder. It worked fine for two weeks, now one file is stuck.
On my side the GUI says it's syncing 77% and that's not changing. No error messages.
The file is on my machine and the remote machine is unable to fetch it for some reason.

I have experienced numerous system crashes recently, maybe that could have caused the trouble?
I can remove that file, but it doesn't seem like a solution to me.

Here's a log from the friend's machine (I removed IPs, names and syncthing IDs):

